name: Temple of Loot
description:
TEMPLE OF LOOT

Note: HTML5 doesn't work in Chrome. Please use Firefox or another browser, or download for your OS. 

Play as Anders, the treasure hunter, as he journeys inside the Temple of Loot. Can you escape with the treasure, and your life?

Tips: 

* Controls: Arrows to move, Space to jump, Esc to pause/quit.

* Jumping off the walls to climb higher is a must. Practice a little in the first section.

This game was made with Godot Engine 3.0. The source has been released under the MIT license and is available for download here.
